title: Hibi Chouchou X Hirunaka No Ryuusei
alternative_title: 日々蝶々 x ひるなかの流星 ; Hibi Ryuusei ; Hirunaka no Chouchou
status: 日々蝶々 x ひるなかの流星 ; Hibi Ryuusei ; Hirunaka no Chouchou
description:
Description :
        Hirunaka no Chouchou - a Shocking Day for New Discoveries: A shopping mall date with Suiren and Kawasumi. But... Suiren gets lost?! She and a small girl find themselves at the Lost Child centre where suddenly Suzume and Mamura come along! Hibi Ryuusei - Suzume’s Parallel School Diary: The Suzume who steals everybody’s attention at the high school entrance ceremony. Though she's no great beauty, she does things at her own pace and is a hot topic amongst everyone. In the middle of this, the only person who doesn’t notice her, Kawasumi – will he become interested?!
